column5: For all those who travel to, or through, Vermilion Bay.....here's a head's up that the old Red Eagle or what later became Moose Creek, on the corner of Hwy 17 and the Red Lake highway, will be re-opened this spring. Ray and Denise Elliot from Bobby's Corner have purchased it and plan on making some changes there. I'm not sure of their long range plans but I was told for this year they would have live bait and a gift shop at that location. I wish them all the best with the new location and am happy to see things turn around for that corner!
Are they moving the bait shop out of the existing location?
I'm not really sure on that, but my impression was that it would be a second location.
maybe to catch the east traffic going up 105. it,s a good location right on the corner.
So at which store do you suppose Bobby will be holding court this year?
Good to hear about this,I wish them well.
He is loud enuf 2 B heard at both stores

Al, or "Bobby" is a good judge of character. He's a great guy, perhaps you just don't understand where he is coming from. He is definately one of a kind. For those that have never met him, you really need to check out the store...........

Been fishing around VB for years. Last summer Al was sitting outside "on break" and didnt really want to come in just to fill out a couple of licenses. As we walked through the door I told him not to worry about it as I knew where the licenses were kept. I have never seen him move so fast.
